creator: kdbarritt@ftbms.com
text:
After installation of Tomcat 4.0.3. When using either startup.bat or the 
ntservice, receive error:
A nonfatal internal JIT 3.10.107(x) error Structured Exception(c0000005) has 
occured in:
   'org/apache/catalina/loader/Webapploader.start ()V' Interpreting method.

It say to report this error to sun java. Sun java say this error will not be 
fixed in jdk 1.2.2.

creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text: As the error message tells you, this is a JVM issue, not a Tomcat bug.
